jsky.navigator
Class NavigatorImageDisplay

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent

                                +--jsky.image.gui.DivaMainImageDisplay
                                      |
                                      +--jsky.navigator.NavigatorImageDisplay
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasicImageDisplay, BasicImageReadableProcessor, CatalogNavigatorOpener, GenericToolBarTarget, GraphicsImageDisplay, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, MainImageDisplay, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable
public class NavigatorImageDisplay
extends DivaMainImageDisplay
implements CatalogNavigatorOpener

Extends the DivaMainImageDisplay class by adding support for browsing catalogs and plotting catalog symbols on the image.

See Also:
